channel.title: Nomad Help
channel.description:
i just followed this quest http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/362109-pi-quest-ritual-hd-video.html
and i got no errors compiling and everything works fine but whenever i go kill regular nomad outside of quest my server automatically shuts down, how can i fix this?
